additionalProperty.name: Ingredients
additionalProperty.value: Water, Behentrimonium Chloride, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Fragrance, PPG-3,, Benzyl Ether Myristate, Sodium Benzoate, Steareth-20, Dimethicone, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid, Butylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-47, Benzophenone-4, Butyl Methoxydeibenzoylmethane, Cymbidium Glandiflorum (Orchid) Flower Extract, Euterpe Olaracea Fruit Extract, Sodium Hydroxide, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, CI 17200.

additionalProperty.name: Warning
additionalProperty.value: Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs rinse immediately.
